about_the_game:
As the sole Summoner, step into the mystical realm of Umbra to rescue it from the encroaching demon army emerging from dimensional rifts. To end this invasion, call upon 60 diverse heroes, each with unique abilities, and engage in strategic, turn-based RPG battles against more than 150 monsters and demons.




Vast Landscapes: Immerse yourself in expansive areas, each brimming with hidden secrets, breathtaking vistas, and treacherous terrains. Umbra offers 15 distinct regions, each waiting to be explored.

Challenging Quests: Tackle over 100 side quests that will test your wit, courage, and strategic thinking. Every quest brings you closer to unraveling the mysteries of Umbra.

Colossal Boss Battles: Face off against formidable boss monsters that guard the demon rifts. Defeat these titans to seal the rifts and push back the demonic invasion.




Turn-Based Battles: Engage in tactical combat using a turn-based system. Manage your action points wisely to unleash powerful attacks and abilities.

Summoning and Strengthening Heroes: Use soul energy, collected from victorious battles, completed quests, and exploration, to summon new heroes, upgrade weapons, and enhance your runes. Build a team of champions to lead the charge against the forces of darkness in good old turn-based RPG fashion.

Elemental Warfare: Master the elements! Each monster, hero, and attack has strengths and weaknesses based on elemental affinities. Use this knowledge to your advantage in battle.




Intruiging NPC Dialogues: Every single NPC in Umbra has a unique dialogue tree, providing depth to the story and offering quests, trade opportunities, or simply enriching conversations.

Dark Lore: Through the many quests, NPCs, heroes, and cutscenes the game tells a dark tale filled with gripping lore and secrets.




A thousand years ago, the mighty demon Behemoth tore a colossal rift in the barrier between our world and the underworld, unleashing an age of darkness. Now, the rifts have reappeared, threatening to plunge the world into chaos once more. As the last remaining Summoner, you must harness the power of ancient heroes and the mystical energy of Phenan to confront these demonic forces. Your journey begins with the king’s urgent plea for help, leading you through the perilous Nightwoods, the Rocky Desert, the Snowcap Mountains, and beyond. Each step brings you closer to a final confrontation with Behemoth himself.




The fate of Umbra rests in your hands. Explore, battle, and unravel the mysteries threatening the land. Become the legend that Umbra needs.
